channel.title: Npc Walks Back to Spawn point
channel.description: I Added the nex right, and now i need to figure out so it doesnt follow further then 5 squares (example), a way to make it walk back to where its original spawn spot once its walked to far, can anyone link me to a tutorial or something? Dont be a dick about it either.

item.title: Npc Walks Back to Spawn point
item.dc:creator: @Jaxi Jaxi
item.description:
@Jaxi wrote:

i’ve searched a few forums, but still no tutorial. I dont need to be spoon fed or anything i just need an example code, so if anyone knows were a tut anywhere it would be great.

Read full topic
item.source: Npc Walks Back to Spawn point

item.title: Npc Walks Back to Spawn point
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

There are many Bases which feature this. They are almost all below the 562 Revision however. This involves Pathfinding, even though it can be done by retrieving the N.P.C. original X/Y Tile Coordinates. Which are already stored in your Source without a doubt. You could enable the N.P.C. return once It’s out of Combat. I’m sure your Source already has this as a preexisting condition as well.

As for the maximum N.P.C. Attack range? You can do a Distance check in It’s formulas or however you have it programmed. I seriously doubt this has advanced statistical storage; otherwise you could implement this as a statistic and that is SOOO much better.

Read full topic
item.source: Npc Walks Back to Spawn point
